forward_prompts: You using Square, Stripe, or something else?
How are most of your payments ‚Äî in-person or online?

Let‚Äôs start with your business name ‚Äî what is it?

objections.already have a system: That‚Äôs common ‚Äî want to compare savings anyway?

curious.example: Want to run your numbers together real fast?

follow_up_styles.soft: Want help wrapping this up today?
follow_up_styles.assertive: Let‚Äôs lock in your savings ‚Äî ready?

annual_savings_formula.description: Estimate how much the merchant can save yearly by switching to a cash discount program.
annual_savings_formula.response_template: You could be losing around ${savings}/yr at {rate}%. Want to fix that?

mobile.reply: You running mobile payments? Clover Flex fits that well.

countertop.reply: That sounds like a countertop setup ‚Äî Clover Mini maybe?

online.reply: Got a website? Want help setting up a fee-free gateway?

reply_style.guidance: Be human, short, and forward-moving. End with a question or clear step. Avoid repeating the same prompt.
examples: Mind if I ask your monthly card volume?
You mostly swipe cards or take them online?
Want me to compare your rate to ours?
Cool if I email you a savings quote?

fallbacks: Want to take the next step or circle back later?
Still thinking? I can simplify it for you.
Cool if I ask one more to help you out?

rapport_questions: How long have you been running your business?

What‚Äôs your busiest time of year?
